records.name: Kandima Maldives - 50 Percent Off On Return Domestic Flight Transfers On Stays 4 Nights Or More Between 01 Apr & 10 Oct 2025

descriptions.direction: Located in Kandima Island, Kandima Maldives is near the airport and on a private beach. Kandima Beach is another place to visit that comes recommended. With windsurfing and surfing/body boarding nearby, you'll find plenty of adventures in the water.
descriptions.general: General description: The hotel Kandima Maldives is located in the vicinity of its own sandy beach. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). There is also a shuttle to to the resort (Domestic + Speedboat Transfers) from 15:20 - 22:00 (for a fee). Amenities: The beach hotel has 266 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception, a lobby, air conditioning, a safe (where applicable, for a fee), coiffeur, a mini market, various other shops, discotheque and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 5 restaurants. In a total 3 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service, laundry service and medical service are available for a fee. For the concierge service the hotel charges a fee (where applicable). Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find 2 pools with a children´s pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas for free available. At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Billiards (where applicable, for a fee) and badminton (where applicable, for a fee). Spa area, sauna, whirlpool and massages available (where applicable for a fee). Entertainment for adults: activity programme with evening shows. For the entertainment of young guests there is a children´s play area. Child supervision: activity programme for children, mini club and babysitting (where applicable, for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and French. Accepted methods of payment: Visa. 2 Bedroom Sky FamilySuite (Domestic Flight): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee), safe (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Sky FamilySuite (Seaplane): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee), safe (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Available during daylight hours from 6:30 hrs to 16:00 hrs.Last international arrival flight for seaplane connection is 15:30h. Domestic transfers are applicable to all guests arriving after 15:15 to 22:00 hrs to Male Airport. Another flight from Male to Dhaalu Atoll Domestic Airport followed by Speedboat ride approx 30 minutes flight & 20 minutes speedboat ride to Resort. Standard permissible weight is 25 kg, which includes 20 kg of checked-in luggage and 5 kg of hand luggage per person. *US$6/- will be charged for infant per day as mandatory supplement*

direction.text: Located in Kandima Island, Kandima Maldives is near the airport and on a private beach. Kandima Beach is another place to visit that comes recommended. With windsurfing and surfing/body boarding nearby, you'll find plenty of adventures in the water.
